component.name: Candle Genie Basic
component.summary: The Pattern Training Lab for Smart Trading Bots

description.p: Candle Genie Basic is the bare-bones, demo version of Candle Genie for building basic candlestick pattern libraries. It's designed to help you start training automated trading bots and exploring candlestick strategies.

ul.li: Free trial for the full Candle Genie experience

description.p: The full-featured version includes advanced editing, up to 5-candle patterns, save/load, and unlimited pattern libraries.
